description:
A defense mechanism that allows for information flow control .
When a user asks the AI system to access a URL, it will only access it if the URL is from a limited set of trusted domains.

external_references.title:
FATH: Authentication-based Test-time Defense against Indirect Prompt
Injection Attacks

external_references.description: The mechanism is explained in the context of Microsoft Copilot (previously Bing Chat). The page you are reading draws a lt of content from this reference.
external_references.title: Bing Chat: Data Exfiltration Exploit Explained

name: Information Flow Control

object_references.description:
Microsoft Copilot can render URLs and links if they fall under these trusted domains:

```
th.bing.com
www.bing.com
edgeservices.bing.com
r.bing.com
```
